title: Ternary 3D/2D/3D direct dual Z-scheme MOF-on-MOF-derived Î±-Fe2O3/g-C3N4/Fe-MOF photocatalyst for boosted sunlight-driven removal of metronidazole: effect of coexisting ions, mechanistic insights, and water matrices
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00610K, Paper
Anindita Bhuyan, Md. Ahmaruzzaman
Fabrication of cauliflower-like Fe(III) carboxylate MOF-based catalyst for degradation of MTZ via ROS generation in a solar-light-activated photocatalytic system and testing its efficacy under various water parameters and environmental substrates.
